BackstoryDef.title: artilleryman
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loaded ammunition and aimed artillery to pound [PAWN_possessive] army's enemies from afar.

BackstoryDef.title: ship boy
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to low-ranked servants on an sea-faring ship. The crew [PAWN_pronoun] worked for was like a second family.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] rarely saw plants or animals, and still finds them unnerving to touch.

BackstoryDef.title: delinquent
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood behind bars. Following an unsuccessful escape attempt, [PAWN_pronoun] was pressed into the military.

BackstoryDef.title: military cook
BackstoryDef.description: They say an army marches on its stomach. [PAWN_nameDef]'s job was to prepared chow to keep [PAWN_possessive] unit marching, no matter the conditions. \nThe job required [PAWN_objective] to pay attention to both the nutritional and psychological needs of the troops.

BackstoryDef.title: line infanteer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an ordinary infanteer in an imperial battalion. \nConscripted at a young age to add bodies the army, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the methods of fighting well enough to satisfy [PAWN_possessive] officers. However, [PAWN_pronoun] never quite understood what was going on around [PAWN_objective] enough to really believe in it.

BackstoryDef.title: warmonger
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] revelled in bloodshed. Soldiers who served with [PAWN_objective] were terrified of [PAWN_possessive] ferocity. They rarely socialized with [PAWN_nameDef], and [PAWN_pronoun] did not mind the isolation.

BackstoryDef.title: siege engineer
BackstoryDef.description: Despite being in an infantry battalion, [PAWN_nameDef] rarely fought in battle. [PAWN_possessive] specialty was the rapid construction of defenses, traps and siege engines.

BackstoryDef.title: military cadet
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was levied from [PAWN_possessive] family at a young age to become a soldier. [PAWN_pronoun] lived in barracks with other military kids, learning about duty, weapons, pain, and victory. \nThe trainers sometimes let the kids escape the base to enjoy the wider world. They wanted soldiers who can think independently.

BackstoryDef.title: royal guard
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] guarded the personal palace of a powerful lord. \nWhile violence was rare, palace intrigue was constant. [PAWN_nameDef]'s work taught [PAWN_pronoun] to handle both words and guns.

BackstoryDef.title: pious soldier
BackstoryDef.description: When not training or combat, [PAWN_nameDef] was often at the chaplain's side. [PAWN_pronoun] dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to serving both [PAWN_possessive] lord and [PAWN_possessive] religion.

BackstoryDef.title: warmaster
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was warmaster to a mid-level royal house. [PAWN_pronoun] oversaw military aspects of the family's strategy. \nOn the rare occasion a battle occurred, [PAWN_nameDef] directed the military commanders.
